verses.text: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye this, O \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*; and \w hearken|strong="H7181"\w*, ye \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and give ye \w ear|strong="H0238"\w*, O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*; for \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \add is\add* toward you, because ye have been a \w snare|strong="H6341"\w* on \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w*, and a \w net|strong="H7568"\w* \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* upon \w Tabor|strong="H8396"\w*.

And the \w revolters|strong="H7846"\w* are \w profound|strong="H6009"\w* to make \w slaughter|strong="H7819"\w*, though I \add have been\add* a \w rebuker|strong="H4148"\w* of them all.\f + \fr 5.2 \ft though: or, and\f*\f + \fr 5.2 \ft a rebuker: Heb. a correction\f*

I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* is not \w hid|strong="H3582"\w* from me: for now, O \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, thou committest \w whoredom|strong="H2181"\w*, \add and\add* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* is \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*.

They will not \w frame|strong="H5414"\w* their \w doings|strong="H4611"\w* to \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* unto their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: for the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w whoredoms|strong="H2183"\w* \add is\add* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of them, and they have not \w known|strong="H3045"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 5.4 \ft They will…: or, Their doings will not suffer them\f*\f + \fr 5.4 \ft frame: Heb. give\f*

And the \w pride|strong="H1347"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* doth \w testify|strong="H6030"\w* to his \w face|strong="H6440"\w*: therefore shall \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w fall|strong="H3782"\w* in their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*; \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* also shall \w fall|strong="H3782"\w* with them.

They shall \w go|strong="H3212"\w* with their \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* and with their \w herds|strong="H1241"\w* to \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; but they shall not \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \add him;\add* he hath \w withdrawn|strong="H2502"\w* himself from them.

They have dealt \w treacherously|strong="H0898"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: for they have \w begotten|strong="H3205"\w* \w strange|strong="H2114"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*: now shall a \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* them with their \w portions|strong="H2506"\w*.

\w Blow|strong="H8628"\w* ye the \w cornet|strong="H7782"\w* in \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*, \add and\add* the \w trumpet|strong="H2689"\w* in \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*: cry \w aloud|strong="H7321"\w* \add at\add* \w Beth-aven|strong="H1007"\w*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* thee, O \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*.

\w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* shall be \w desolate|strong="H8047"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w rebuke|strong="H8433"\w*: among the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* have I made \w known|strong="H3045"\w* that which shall surely \w be|strong="H0539"\w*.

The \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* were like them that \w remove|strong="H5253"\w* the \w bound|strong="H1366"\w*: \add therefore\add* I will pour \w out|strong="H8210"\w* my \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w* upon them like \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \add is\add* \w oppressed|strong="H6231"\w* \add and\add* \w broken|strong="H7533"\w* in \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, because he \w willingly|strong="H2974"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w commandment|strong="H6673"\w*.

Therefore \add will\add* I \add be\add* unto \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* as a \w moth|strong="H6211"\w*, and to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* as \w rottenness|strong="H7538"\w*.\f + \fr 5.12 \ft rottenness: or, a worm\f*

When \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* his \w sickness|strong="H2483"\w*, and \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \add saw\add* his \w wound|strong="H4205"\w*, then \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* to the \w Assyrian|strong="H0804"\w*, and \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jareb|strong="H3377"\w*: yet \w could|strong="H3201"\w* he not \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* you, nor \w cure|strong="H1455"\w* you of your \w wound|strong="H4205"\w*.\f + \fr 5.13 \ft king Jareb: or, the king of Jareb: or, the king that should plead\f*

For I \add will be\add* unto \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* as a \w lion|strong="H7826"\w*, and as a young \w lion|strong="H3715"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*: I, \add even\add* I, will \w tear|strong="H2963"\w* and go \w away|strong="H3212"\w*; I will take \w away|strong="H5375"\w*, and none shall \w rescue|strong="H5337"\w* \add him\add*.

¶ I will \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \add and\add* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to my \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, till they acknowledge their \w offence|strong="H0816"\w*, and \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w*: in their \w affliction|strong="H6862"\w* they will seek me \w early|strong="H7836"\w*.\f + \fr 5.15 \ft acknowledge…: Heb. be guilty\f*
